com.samskivert.util
Class Lifecycle

java.lang.Object
  com.samskivert.util.Lifecycle

public class Lifecycle
extends Object

Manages the lifecycle (initialization and shutdown) of a collection of components.

Nested Class Summary
static interface Lifecycle.BaseComponent
          An interface implemented by components which wish to participate in the lifecycle.
static interface Lifecycle.Component
          An interface implemented by components which wish to participate in the lifecycle.
static class Lifecycle.Constraint
          Constraints for use with addInitConstraint(com.samskivert.util.Lifecycle.InitComponent, com.samskivert.util.Lifecycle.Constraint, com.samskivert.util.Lifecycle.InitComponent) and addShutdownConstraint(com.samskivert.util.Lifecycle.ShutdownComponent, com.samskivert.util.Lifecycle.Constraint, com.samskivert.util.Lifecycle.ShutdownComponent).
static interface Lifecycle.InitComponent
          An interface implemented by components which wish to participate in the lifecycle.
static interface Lifecycle.ShutdownComponent
          An interface implemented by components which wish to participate in the lifecycle.
 
Constructor Summary
Lifecycle()
           
 
Method Summary
 void addComponent(Lifecycle.BaseComponent comp)
          Registers a component with the lifecycle.
 void addInitConstraint(Lifecycle.InitComponent lhs, Lifecycle.Constraint constraint, Lifecycle.InitComponent rhs)
          Adds a constraint that a certain component must be initialized before another.
 void addShutdownConstraint(Lifecycle.ShutdownComponent lhs, Lifecycle.Constraint constraint, Lifecycle.ShutdownComponent rhs)
          Adds a constraint that a certain component must be shutdown before another.
 void init()
          Initializes all components immediately on the caller's thread.
 boolean isShuttingDown()
          Returns true if we're in the process of shutting down.
 void removeComponent(Lifecycle.BaseComponent comp)
          Removes a component from the lifecycle.
 void shutdown()
          Shuts down all components immediately on the caller's thread.

Constructor Detail

Lifecycle

public Lifecycle()
Method Detail

addComponent

public void addComponent(Lifecycle.BaseComponent comp)
Registers a component with the lifecycle. This should be done during dependency resolution by injecting the Lifecycle into your constructor and calling this method there.

removeComponent

public void removeComponent(Lifecycle.BaseComponent comp)
Removes a component from the lifecycle. This is generally not used.

addInitConstraint

public void addInitConstraint(Lifecycle.InitComponent lhs,
                              Lifecycle.Constraint constraint,
                              Lifecycle.InitComponent rhs)
Adds a constraint that a certain component must be initialized before another.

addShutdownConstraint

public void addShutdownConstraint(Lifecycle.ShutdownComponent lhs,
                                  Lifecycle.Constraint constraint,
                                  Lifecycle.ShutdownComponent rhs)
Adds a constraint that a certain component must be shutdown before another.

isShuttingDown

public boolean isShuttingDown()
Returns true if we're in the process of shutting down.

init

public void init()
Initializes all components immediately on the caller's thread.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shuts down all components immediately on the caller's thread.
